png

Class PngChunkZTXT

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.PngChunk
      • png.PngChunkZTXT

  • public class PngChunkZTXT
extends PngChunk
    Extended to support a zTXt (compressed textual data) chunk in a PNG file.

    This class provides decoding support for PNG zTXt chunks, which store compressed Latin-1 text paired with a keyword. The chunk format is:

    • Keyword: 1â€“79 bytes (Latin-1), followed by a null byte
    • Compression method: 1 byte (only value 0 is valid for zlib/deflate)
    • Compressed text: remaining bytes, compressed using zlib
    Since:
    21 June 2025
    Version:
    0.2

    • Constructor Detail

      • PngChunkZTXT

        public PngChunkZTXT(int length,
                    ChunkType chunkType,
                    int crc,
                    byte[] data)
        Constructs a PngChunkZTXT instance.
        Parameters:
        length - the data length of the chunk (excluding chunk type and CRC)
        chunkType - the type of the chunk (should be zTXt)
        crc - the CRC value (currently not validated)
        data - the raw byte array representing the chunk contents

    • Method Detail

      • getKeywordPair

        public TextEntry getKeywordPair()
        Extracts and de-compresses the keyword-text pair from this zTXt chunk.
        Overrides:
        getKeywordPair in class PngChunk
        Returns:
        a TextEntry containing the keyword and the de-compressed text, or null if parsing fails
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the compression method is unsupported or decompression fails

      • getKeyword

        public java.lang.String getKeyword()
        Gets the keyword extracted from the iTXt chunk.
        Returns:
        the keyword, or null if not yet parsed

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Gets the text extracted from the iTXt chunk.
        Returns:
        the UTF-8 text, or null if not yet parsed
